titleStmt.title: Emblems of rarities: or Choyce observations out of worthy histories of many remarkable passages, and renowned actions of divers princes and severall nations With exquisite variety, and speciall collections of the natures of most sorts of creatures: delightfull and profitable to the minde. Collected by D.L.
titleStmt.author: Lupton, Donald, d. 1676.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-X¹² .
Running title reads: Emblemes of rarities.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
